name: ax-pre-lttrn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cltrr, c1), wbr(c1, cltrr, c2)), wbr(c0, cltrr, c2)))
comment: Ordering on reals is transitive. Axiom 19 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axpre-lttrn . Note: The more general version for extended reals is ~ axlttrn . Normally new proofs would use ~ lttr . (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
